Package it.polimi.ingsw.commons.message

Interface LobbyMessageReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController, GameManager
public interface LobbyMessageReader
All LobbyMessage readers need to implement this interface. This interface lists all commands sent from server to client and viceversa in the Lobby part of the dialogue.
